00029 #import <pthread.h>
00030 
00031 @protocol WIReadWriteLocking
00032 
00033 - (void)lockForReading;
00034 - (void)lockForWriting;
00035 - (void)unlock;
00036 
00037 @end
00038 
00039 
00040 @interface WIReadWriteLock : WIObject <WIReadWriteLocking> {
00041         pthread_rwlock_t                        _lock;
00042 }
00043 
00044 - (BOOL)tryLockForReading;
00045 - (BOOL)tryLockForWriting;
00046 
00047 @end
